content: Abdullah Al Arafat Abdullah Al ArafatAssistant Professor, FIU Follow Miami, FL, USA Florida International University aarafat@fiu.edu Google ScholarI am an Assistant Professor at the Knight Foundation School of Computing and Information Sciences (KFSCIS) at Florida International University (FIU), Miami. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from North Carolina State University in 2025.
